hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir that:the Prophet forbade Mukhabarah, Muzabanah and Muhaqalah, and selling fruits until they were fit to eat, except in the case f 'Aray

chapter.ara-name: باب بَيْعِ الثَّمَرِ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَبْدُوَ صَلاَحُهُ
chapter.eng-name: Selling Fruits Before Their Condition Is Known
